snippet: Carson Yeung, the owner of the Birmingham City soccer club, faces a maximum of seven years in jail for five counts in the laundering of a total of nearly $100 million.
lead_paragraph: Carson Yeung, the owner of the Birmingham City soccer club, faces a maximum of seven years in jail for five counts in the laundering of a total of nearly $100 million.

headline.main: Hong Kong Businessman Found Guilty of Money Laundering
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong Businessman Found Guilty of Money Laundering
